full_text: Subject: Fwd: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death >>> "NYM/Exec Assistant~" 08/10/2019 18:51 >>> (b)(7)(E) Thank you Lee >>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @buzzfeed.com> 8/10/2019 6:03 PM >>> Hello, I'm a reporter with BuzzFeed News. I'm reaching out because we suspect one of the paramedics involved in responding the Jeffrey Epstein call posted information online before it was reported in the mainstream media. We were able to view posts on the website 4chan, frequented by far-right trolls, that were published a full 45 minutes before ABC news first reported Epstein's death. I'd like to send you the posts to verify whether the information in them is correct and whether it could have come to your team but in addition to that, do you have any statement on the situation? Thank you, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) -- (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Reporter | BuzzFeed News PGP | Signal, WhatsApp, Telegram, Cell: +1 (613) 276-(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Send anonymous tip: contact.buzzfeed.com Page 4937 DOJ-OGR-00024386

text_blocks.content: Subject: Fwd: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death

Hello, I'm a reporter with BuzzFeed News. I'm reaching out because we suspect one of the paramedics involved in responding the Jeffrey Epstein call posted information online before it was reported in the mainstream media. We were able to view posts on the website 4chan, frequented by far-right trolls, that were published a full 45 minutes before ABC news first reported Epstein's death. I'd like to send you the posts to verify whether the information in them is correct and whether it could have come to your team but in addition to that, do you have any statement on the situation?
-- (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Reporter | BuzzFeed News PGP | Signal, WhatsApp, Telegram, Cell: +1 (613) 276-(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Send anonymous tip: contact.buzzfeed.com

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain with redactions. The redactions are likely due to privacy or security concerns.
